Summary: Orange Light with smoke trail Thought Plane blew up
divs: Sighting DetailsOrange light leaving smokey trail,traveled as a plane would then descended as it vanished. Thought Plane blew up, check accuracy flight radar no flight. Second thought looked like a missile trail as of a NASA launch of a shuttle. Then noticed the smoke trail. The light was up maybe 5 mins. left a smoke from flames. Dont believe in UFOs but it was something!
